useCase.name: Understanding Visual Designs from Similar Organizations

preconditions.precondition: The Site Administrator requests a visual design overview from the Research Team.

mainSequence.step: The Site Administrator requests a visual design overview from the Research Team.
The Research Team researches visual designs from external websites.
The Research Team receives data on visual designs from external websites.
The Research Team updates the Design Guidelines Repository with research findings.
The Site Administrator reviews the updated guidelines in the Design Guidelines Repository.
